name: Idle Is Bad
description:
Idle Is Bad

Here is a little classic platformer, and my participation to the Ludum Dare Game Jam !

What's in this game ?

10 levels. You'll have to jump on breaking platforms, pick up a key, and open the exit door. There's even bzzt bzzters ! Isn't that cool ?

How do i play ?
  • Left and right arrows to move
  • Space to jump : the longer you press, the higher you go
  • Shift to move camera
    Game's Screenshots

No jokes about electricity please.
Run !
